comments.body:
It would be great if we add more doc to describe some details for the new data source. e.g., 
1. the input param and its usage(maybe we can also add it to the data source document http://spark.apache.org/docs/latest/sql-data-sources.html in another PR).
2. for the schema, if we find the schema file already exists in checkpoint dir, then we'll use it directly. Otherwise, it requires to be specified.
Yeah I just wanted to make sure community is interested with my proposal before putting details. If we think this is good to go, I'll care about the documentation part as well.
